thread.title: Brewdog gives staff a week off when they get a puppy
thread.title_full: Brewdog gives staff a week off when they get a puppy

title: Brewdog gives staff a week off when they get a puppy
text: Pawternity leave: Beer company gives workers a week off work when they get a new puppy Scottish beer company BrewDog gives new dog owners a week of paid leave Employees are also allowed to bring their dogs with them to work normally The perk will be available to staff at its first US base in Columbus, Ohio BrewDog allows the animals in all of its bars around the world The company was launched by its founders and their beloved pet in 2007 Published: 22:15 GMT, 16 February 2017 | Updated: 22:39 GMT, 16 February 2017 7 shares
